name: Walter W. COHEN, Consumer Advocate, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION; Petition of EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE SOCIETY, et al. David M. BARASCH, Consumer Advocate, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION
name_abbreviation: Cohen v. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission
docket_number: Appeal Nos. 569 W.D. Allocatur Docket 1985 and 619 W.D. Allocatur Docket 1986

parties: Walter W. COHEN, Consumer Advocate, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION. Petition of EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE SOCIETY, et al. David M. BARASCH, Consumer Advocate, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION.

opinions.text: Petitions for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, Nos. 33 W.D. Docket 1986 and 34 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
508 A.2d 1197
Walter W. COHEN, Consumer Advocate, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION. Petition of EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE SOCIETY, et al. David M. BARASCH, Consumer Advocate, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION.
